climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Advanced clean dish detergent powder booster formula that breaks down your toughest messes
Enzyme rich powder to blast away stuck on food
Prevents Hard Water Spots on your dishes, leaving them with a brilliant shine
94 percent Biobased; Plant-powered mineral-enriched booster formula
No pre rinse needed - use with your favorite dishwasher detergent or dishwasher tabs
100 percent Biodegradable Ingredients and EPA Safer Choice dishwasher powder booster
body.description: Ultra-clean dishes made ultra-simple. Meet Seventh Generation Dishwasher Detergent Booster. Advanced cleaning done right the first time, even in hard water, when used with your favorite detergent. Our plant-powered, mineral-enriched Booster formula blasts away 24-hour stuck on food - no pre rinse needed. And with an EPA Safer Choice Certified Product that uses biodegradable dish soap ingredients you can feel good about, we're cleaning up dishes one load at a time. For more than 30 years, Seventh Generation has been thoughtfully formulating safe and effective plant-based products that work. Really well. Our dishwashing detergents and boosters use powerful plant-based ingredients like surfactants and enzymes to break down tough residue and lift away food, leaving your dishes sparkling clean. So, how does it all work? The enzymes cut through grease and food by breaking down starch and protein-based residue, while the surfactants remove dirt and grease by holding the molecules in suspension, so they can wash away. Yes, even those fussy egg stains. Based in Vermont, Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really makes a difference
reviews.reviewText: I don't have a rinse dispenser, so I have to put product in bottom of dishwasher, but it cleans dishes and glassware is almost spotless. I wouldn't be without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaves a film
reviews.reviewText: Leaves a very horrible film on all of the dishes. Pots, glasses... doesn't matter. Would not recommend this product unless that is what you are looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty well
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on a whim after my regular brand just stopped working and this was what shipped quickly, but I am pretty glad I did because it cleans pretty darn well, I'll be repurchasing it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s an ok product…
reviews.reviewText: It’s an ok product but it leaves a dusty residue on my dishes after they dry. It’s also pricey considering the mediocre quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets Everything Off
reviews.reviewText: This stuff works great!I just give my dishes a light rinse before loading them in the dishwasher, and this booster (paired with the same brand detergent) gets everything off. Very rarely does something come out of my dishwasher with any baked on food or grease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves white film on dishes and in dishwasher

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Makes dishes dirtier
reviews.reviewText: Leaves terrible residue. I always try to buy environmentally friendly but this product is so bad, I’d rather use no booster than this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: I've used regular dishwasher pods and my dishes were always coming out with Grease and stuck on food. I felt I just needed a appliance upgrade, my dishwasher is Over 10 years old. For the price thought I'd give this a shot. My dishes came out very clean, greasy dishes came out spotless. I was very surprised . I used to run the washer 2 times before getting any real results and this changed my mind about upgraded. Def recommend and my dishwasher also came out clean. Very happy customer.
